Warlock Guide & Builds

Baldur's Gate 3 Build Guide: Warlock: Warlocks in Baldurâ€™s Gate 3 are extremely powerful because of their Cantrip Eldritch Blast that does between 1-10 damage every use from 18m away, and Cantrips can be cast every turn without using up Spell Slots. Additionally, they have some very good spells that deal AoE damage, and they can also melee effectively because of Pact of the Blade.
